meanings.definition: To recall past experiences or events.
meanings.sent1: I like to reminisce about my childhood days.
meanings.sent2: Every time we meet, we reminisce about our school days.
meanings.sent3: Grandpa loves to reminisce about the good old days.
meanings.sent4: As I look at the old photographs, I reminisce about the happy times.
meanings.sent5: The smell of fresh cookies made me reminisce about baking with my mom.

meanings.definition: To talk or write about past experiences in a nostalgic way.
meanings.sent1: She would often reminisce about her travels around the world.
meanings.sent2: In her diary, she would reminisce about the summers spent at the beach.
meanings.sent3: The group of friends would always reminisce about their camping adventures.
meanings.sent4: His stories made everyone reminisce about their own childhood memories.
meanings.sent5: The old song made her reminisce about her first dance at the prom.
